title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Equations of Geophysical Fluid Dynamics. Geophysical Turbulence modelling. Stratified, coriolis and buoyancy driven flows. Rosby waves, Acoustic gravity waves. Planetary waves and atmospheric tides. Stratified atmospheric boundary layers near ground. Free convection boundary layers. Boundary layers over rough terrain. Global circulation models and related computational methods.
